newsitem.title: USA: Wayne Savings to form stock holding co.
newsitem.headline: Wayne Savings to form stock holding co.

text.p: Wayne Savings and Loan Co said Tuesday its board had decided to reorganize the bank into a two-tier mutual holding company, with the establishment of a state-chartered corporation as the stock holding company parent of the Bank.
Upon completion of the reorganization, Wayne Savings Bankshares MHC, the bank's existing mutual holding company, will own a majority of the common stock of the new stock holding company.
The new stock holding company will own 100 percent of the common stock of the bank.
